## buildConsensus

Removes sequences that are either too short or too long.

```{r include=FALSE}
opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE)
opts_chunk$set(warning=FALSE)
opts_chunk$set(fig.pos = 'H')

library(MotifBinner2)

if (!exists('result'))
{
  result <- all_results[[grep('buildConsensus', names(all_results))[1]]]
}
if (class(result) != 'buildConsensus')
{
  result <- all_results[[grep('buildConsensus', names(all_results))[1]]]
}
```

The following datasets must be scanned for short or long sequences:
`r names(result$kept)`

```{r, results='asis'}
kable_summary(result$summary)

timingTable(result)
```
